definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: The ah, China, really is a troublous times this year.
sentences.chinese: 哎，中國，今年實在是多事之秋。

sentences.english: The year 1968 was one of political upheaval throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 1968年是全世界政局的多事之秋。

sentences.english: It’s been an eventful time, even by the standards set in the past couple of years.
sentences.chinese: 即便用過去的標準來進行衡量，這也還是個多事之秋。

definition: internal trouble and outside aggression (idiom); in a mess both domestically and abroad
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
the year's horoscope augurs ill (idiom); an unlucky year
on this (occasion)/at this time when .../on this occasion
before the first wave subsides, a new wave rises (idiom); a new problem arises before the old is solved/many twists and turns to a story/one thing after another
pinyin: yi1 bo1 wei4 ping2 , yi1 bo1 you4 qi3
wu1 lou4 pian1 feng2 lian2 ye4 yu3

definition: a conflict arises close to home (idiom)
(dialect) critical juncture/crucial moment/Taiwan pr. [jie2 gu5 yan3]
